formattedAddress: 1070 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1070 Park Ave, New York, NY 10128-1000, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Gupta and her staff are the best of the best! So warm, welcoming and caring!! She is the only doctor that I trust with my Botox injections. I also had arm liposuction with her and the results are incredible!!! I work out a lot and had stubborn arm fat from a previous surgery by another doctor. She did a revision on me  and changed my life!!! She is the best, very gentle, and pays attention to detail. Highly recommend!!

She did a revision on me  and changed my life!!! She is the best, very gentle, and pays attention to detail. Highly recommend!!

originalText.text: Dr. Gupta is an artist in facial renewals, eyelids and every other part of your face. She never wants to overdue, always errs to caution, and she definitely is one of the finest doctors in the USA. Her staff is friendly and caring which puts you totally at ease.

text.text: Dr. Gupta is an artist in facial renewals, eyelids and every other part of your face. She never wants to overdue, always errs to caution, and she definitely is one of the finest doctors in the USA. Her staff is friendly and caring which puts you totally at ease.

originalText.text:
I had much needed eye lid surgery “Blepharoplasty” with Dr. Gupta and it has literally changed my life. I feel 10 years younger!! I had an amazing experience with Dr. Gupta from beginning to end. Dr. Gupta and her staff were very compassionate, caring, and professional. I wanted my “eyes done” for my daughter’s wedding and was pressed for time. Anne Muller the office manager worked diligently to get me an appointment for a consultation, and she was also able to schedule my surgery in plenty of time for the wedding.
Dr. Gupta listened to everything I wanted and gave me exactly what I was looking for. She has an amazing ability to make you feel so comfortable and like you've known her for years. She is a true artist and perfectionist. She addressed all my concerns, discussed various options with me and explained all the cutting-edge techniques available. I highly recommend Dr. Gupta for all cosmetic surgical and non-surgical procedures as she has a unique approach towards a youthful rejuvenation of the whole body.

originalText.text: After an extensive search in finding the right doctor for my procedure, I hit the jackpot with Dr. Gupta.  She is a perfectionist, an artist and very caring to ensure that all of my concerns were addressed.  Her staff is wonderful!!  Professional, so sweet and caring.  I highly recommended Dr. Gupta!

text.text: After an extensive search in finding the right doctor for my procedure, I hit the jackpot with Dr. Gupta.  She is a perfectionist, an artist and very caring to ensure that all of my concerns were addressed.  Her staff is wonderful!!  Professional, so sweet and caring.  I highly recommended Dr. Gupta!

originalText.text: I had xanthelasma for years prior to seeing Dr. Gupta.  In the past two years, they became more noticeable.  Before seeing anyone, I needed to use a lot of eye makeup  to hid the ones on my upper lids, the ones on my lower lids could not be hidden. I never imagined myself seeing a plastic surgeon and foolishly tried removing my xanthelasmas with a glycolic acid gel sold on Amazon having many excellent reviews.  I ended up scarring my eyes so I called Dr. Gupta's office.   I went for a consultation and Dr. Gupta assured me she could help.  It is now a bit past four months since my initial surgery.  I am happier than I've been in years.  I only wear mascara now and do not need to glob on make up to cover up spots.  In addition to removing my xanthelasma and scar tissue, she gave me an upper and lower blepharoplasty.  My eyes look more open, like they did when I was younger.  I will never regret the money spent and am so happy I met Dr. Gupta.  While she is expensive, as all top surgeons are, she is a perfectionist.  The price includes checking my eyes every 8 weeks and giving additional laser treatments when necessary.  I am thrilled right now as I don't have to put on a ton of make up before seeing anyone but she tells me my eyes will keep looking better the first year.  It's only been four months for me and I am already thrilled.  Dr. Gupta is wonderful!
